core.visualizer

Class Visualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.visualizer.Visualizer

  • public class Visualizer
extends java.lang.Object
    General purpose visualization class, provides a full screen viewing with panning, scaling and the ability to click/drag vertices.

        View the graph and choose to show the edge labels.
        Type Parameters:

        E - The edge type.
        Parameters:

      • viewGraph

        public static <V,E> void viewGraph(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<V,E> graph,
                                   V node,
                                   boolean viewEdgeLabels)
        General viewer that highlights a specific node (the root)
        Type Parameters:
        V - The vertex type.
        E - The edge type.
        Parameters:
        graph - - The graph to view
        node - - A node to highlight (typically to show where searches began)

      • viewTree

        public static <V,E> void viewTree(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Forest<V,E> forest,
                                  edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.layout.Layout<V,E> givenLayout)
        Visualize the forest with a given layout. If null is provided for the layout a new TreeLayout will be created for the visualization.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The vertex type.
        E - The edge type.
        Parameters:
        forest - The forest/tree to visualize.
        givenLayout - The layout to use or null.

      • viewGraph

        public static <V,E> void viewGraph(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<V,E> graph,
                                   edu.uci.ics.jung.algorithms.layout.Layout<V,E> givenLayout,
                                   V node,
                                   boolean viewEdgeLabels)
        View the graph with the layout provided by the user.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The vertex type.
        E - The edge type.
        Parameters:
        givenLayout - The layout style to view with, can be null.
        graph - The graph to view.
        node - The vertex to indicate as the root, if any.
        viewEdgeLabels - Boolean to indicate if edge labels should be shown.
